sourcesContent:
<template>
  <quad :quad="word.quad"
        :quad-style="quadStyle"
        :blink="selectWord"
        @mouseover="mouseOverEvent"
        @mouseleave="mouseLeaveEvent" />
</template>

<script>
import Quad from './Quad'
import { colorOf } from "@/constants/color"

export default {
  props: ['word'],
  components: { Quad },
  computed: {
    line: function () { return this.$store.getters['annotation/line'](this.word) },
    field: function () { return this.$store.getters['annotation/field'](this.line) },
    hoverField: function () { return this.$store.state.annotation.hoverField === this.field },
    selectField: function () { return this.$store.state.annotation.selectField === this.field },
    hoverLine: function () { return this.$store.state.annotation.hoverLine === this.line },
    selectLine: function () { return this.$store.state.annotation.selectLine === this.line },
    hoverWord: function () { return this.$store.state.annotation.hoverWord === this.word },
    selectWord: function () { return this.$store.state.annotation.selectWord === this.word },
    quadStyle
  },
  methods: {
    mouseOverEvent,
    mouseLeaveEvent
  }
}

function quadStyle () {
  let opacity = 0.3
  let lineOpacity = 0.95
  let width = 1
  let color = colorOf(this.field.labels[0], 1.0)

  if (this.hoverWord) {
    opacity = 0.3
    width = 10
    lineOpacity = 0.5
  } else if (this.hoverLine) {
    opacity = 0.3
    width = 5
    lineOpacity = 0.5
  } else if (this.hoverField) {
    opacity = 0.3
    width = 5
    lineOpacity = 0.5
  }

  if (this.selectWord) {
    opacity = 0.0
    width = 5
  } else if (this.selectLine) {
    opacity = 0.15
  } else if (this.selectField) {
    opacity = 0.15
  }
  return `fill:${color};stroke:${color};stroke-width:${width};stroke-opacity:${lineOpacity};fill-opacity:${opacity}`
}

function mouseOverEvent () {
  this.$store.commit('annotation/setHoverWord', this.word)
}

function mouseLeaveEvent () {
  this.$store.commit('annotation/setHoverWord', {})
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
